DOC.brief_summary: Double-blind, randomized, placebo and active controlled dose-ascending study to investigate safety, tolerability, pharmacokinetics and pharmacodynamics of ACP-001 (TransCon PEG hGH).
DOC.brief_title: Pharmacokinetics and Pharmacodynamics of ACP-001 (TransCon PEG hGH)
DOC.criteria: Healthy male subjects 20 to 45 years old Body Mass Index of 18.5 kg/m2 and less than or equal to 29.9 kg/m2 Others Known history of hypersensitivity to human growth hormone (hGH) Known history of cardiac, pulmonary, gastrointestinal, endocrine, musculoskeletal, neurological, hematological, immunological, hepatic or renal disease, or malignancies Others
